mapper.select: select * from mileage where usercode= #{usercode} order by m_day desc
select * from mileage where usercode= #{usercode} and m_content = '마일리지 출금' order by m_day desc
SELECT * FROM mileage WHERE usercode= #{usercode} and m_day = (SELECT MAX(m_day)AS m_day FROM mileage)
mapper.update: update USER_DETAIL set mileage=#{m_total} where usercode=#{usercode}
mapper.select: select * from job where usercode=#{usercode} order by j_Registration desc
select * from jobsearch where usercode=#{usercode} order by js_registration desc
select a.name j_info, j.job job from (select USERCODE, name from users u, jobcheck ch where ch.JK_USERCODE = u.USERCODE and ch.JOBSEARCHCODE=#{JOBSEARCHCODE}) a, job j where a.USERCODE = j.USERCODE

select b.pd_name pd_name, b.de_date de_date, b.de_cnt de_cnt, b.name name, b.phone phone, ud.USER_HOME USER_HOME, b.prod_code prod_code from (select a.pd_name , a.de_date , a.de_cnt , name, phone, usercode, a.prod_code prod_code from(select pd_name, de_date, de_cnt, de_usercode, p.prod_code prod_code from product p, deal d where p.prod_code = d.prod_code and usercode=#{usercode})a, users u where a.de_usercode= u.USERCODE)b, user_detail ud where b.usercode = ud.usercode

select pd_d.de_date de_date, pd_d.de_cnt de_cnt, pd_d.pd_name pd_name, pd_d.prod_code prod_code, u.name name, u.phone phone from (select d.de_date de_date, d.de_cnt de_cnt, pd.pd_name pd_name, pd.usercode usercode, d.prod_code prod_code from deal d, product pd where d.prod_code=pd.prod_code and de_usercode=#{usercode})pd_d, users u where pd_d.usercode=u.usercode

select a.au_name au_name, a.ctprice ctprice, a.fin_time fin_time, a.state state, a.auctioncode auctioncode, a.name name, a.phone phone, ude.user_home user_home from (select auc.au_name au_name, auc.ctprice ctprice, auc.fin_time fin_time, auc.state state, auc.auctioncode auctioncode, auc.fin_name fin_name, u.name name, u.phone phone from auction auc, users u where auc.fin_name = u.usercode(+) and auc.usercode=#{usercode})a, user_detail ude where a.fin_name = ude.usercode(+) order by a.state asc ,a.auctioncode desc
